findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: Owner can increase totalSupply by calling add() function and then distribute token amount, so this is kind of minting.

findings.title: Owner can burn
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to burn tokens.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw BNBs from the contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw BNBs from the contract.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw tokens from contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw tokens from the contract.

findings.title: Owner can stop distribution
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to stop token distribution.

findings.title: Owner can distribute tokens
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to distribute token amounts, which can be considered as minting.

findings.title: Owner can change tokensPerBsc value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tokensPerBsc value, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: getTokens function errors: bonusCond3 is lower than bonusCond2
findings.description: (msg.value >= bonusCond2 && msg.value < bonusCond3) will never be true because bonusCond3 is lower than bonusCond2.

findings.title: getTokens function errors: deadline value higher than round2 value
findings.description: (now >= deadline && now >= round1 && now < round2) will never be true, because deadline value higher than round2 value.
